title: Blizzard in a Bottle
summaries: The Blizzard in a Bottle is an accessory which works similarly to the Cloud in a Bottle, allowing the player to double-jump. Instead of a cloud being produced when the player jumps, a trail of snow is produced at the player's feet.
The Blizzard jump goes 8 tiles into the air, totalling 14 tiles when put together with the first jump.

The Blizzard in a Bottle can be found in Frozen Chests in the Ice biome, and it can be dropped from Frozen Crates and Boreal Crates. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it can also be crafted at a Crystal Ball.
